results.definition: an incident in which an infectious disease is transmitted
the communication of an attitude or emotional state among a number of people
examples: the infection of his enthusiasm for poetry

results.definition: (international law) illegality that taints or contaminates a ship or cargo rendering it liable to seizure
(medicine) the invasion of the body by pathogenic microorganisms and their multiplication which can lead to tissue damage and disease

examples: ambitious men are led astray by an infection that is almost unavoidable

results.definition: (phonetics) the alteration of a speech sound under the influence of a neighboring sound
the pathological state resulting from the invasion of the body by pathogenic microorganisms
